full_description: Shake the bottle with proper arm, then beat the block with hammer
schema: {A} notifies the bottle, {a} notifies the arm to pick the bottle, {B} notifies the hammer, {b} notifies the arm to grab the hammer
preference: num of words should not exceed 15. Degree of detail avg is 8.
